main: Her passive inflicts {status:DianxueDonQuixote} on the last enemy she hits every turn. This stacks up to 3 times if you keep applying it on the same enemy. Applying it on another enemy, the stack on the previous enemy expires, and it restarts at 1 stack on the new one.

Skills gain bonus Clash and/or Base Power against the enemy with {status:DianxueDonQuixote} depending on how many stacks it has. S2 and S3 also gets additional {status:Breath} generation and inflicts additional {status:DefenseDown}.
other: Her Coin Power conditionals are based on her speed over her target's. Her passive provides {status:Agility} to help with that as long as you keep her {status:Breath} up. All her conditionals max out at 4 speed higher than her target's.
{status:DianxueDonQuixote} increases her max damage bonus against targets with {status:Combustion}.

1031101.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 5 [Breath] Potency on self (max 2)

Against the target(or the Part) a Base Attack Skill hit last, inflict [DianxueDonQuixote] next turn (once per turn)

Deal +([Combustion] Potency on the target)% damage on Critical Hit (max 15%)
1031101.name: Virescent Pyrojade

1031111.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 3 [Breath] Potency on self (max 2)

Against the target(or the Part) a Base Attack Skill hit last, inflict [DianxueDonQuixote] next turn (once per turn)

Deal +([Combustion] Potency on the target)% damage on Critical Hit (max 15%)
- Increase max cap by 5% for every 1 [DianxueDonQuixote] on the target
1031111.name: Virescent Pyrojade

1031121.desc: 1 ally with the fastest Speed : On Clash Win against enemies with [Combustion] or 'Unique Burn', gain 1 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
1031121.name: Featherstride Technique

1031131.desc:
1 ally with the fastest Speed : On Clash Win against enemies with [Combustion] or 'Unique Burn', gain 1 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
- If the target has 20+ [Combustion] Potency, gain 1 additional [Agility]
1031131.name: Featherstride Technique
